documents.title: things to listen to and watch tonight
text: saccenti/4ad three things to listen to merchandise .
glasgow , stereo .
former punks have been digging into their melodic side and found success .
john grant with the royal northern sinfonia , birmingham town hall .
orchestrail reworkings of originally electronic compositions but the heart on sleeve performance remains consistent .
kylouris white , london , cargo .
experimental music with a cretan flavour , no less .
three things to watch get on up : a relatively standard biopic raised up into something out of the ordinary by the performance of chadwick boseman as james brown .
what we do in the shadows jemaine 'flight of the conchords ' clement returns with a funny as you like mockumentary about the undead .
posh people : inside tatler .
documentary on the magazine that faithfully reports the goings on amongst all the jeremys and tabithas that matter .
but who would have guessed it would be so competitive ?

quite a line up .
makes you think it might be far from the normal bodice ripper ride the pony

documents.title: waka flocka flame 's throat drop ads feel like an snl thing , but they 're not
text: or like something from too many cooks smoke or a funny or die thing red people or just something people might watch on tv during 30 rock got my back but pine brothers are real .
you can buy their softish throat drops here .
though , to be fair , even their website looks like a spoof .
but look , here 's martha stewart shilling for them too .
and she does n't do adverts .
as she tells you very quickly .
they 're an experience have pine brothers managed to stumble on a style of advertising that is both cheap and old-fashioned and stylish and post-modern ?
am i losing my mind here ?
also can any body else match this for weird celebrity endorsement ?
nancy durrant ( @ nancydurrant ) @ guideguardian lang lang advertising bathrooms in china .
doing that 'oooo look at my magic hands ' thing in front of a sink .
do let me know !

documents.title: the monday tune injection
text: ariana grande - santa tell me merry xmas everybody !

i ca n't claim to have even the foggiest clue as to quite the hold this latest disney teen graduate has on the imagination of children , but i do now a half-decent mariah xmas impersonation when i hear one and this is it .
i mean , i 'm not going to play it at work drinks or anything but her voice is caramel enough and there 's a little bit of swing underneath the sleigh bells .

killer mike - sunday morning massacres in the deep south , god is close to gangsta with the consistent praise afforded his run the jewels project , rapper killer mike currently enjoys a critical reputation equalled only by the lovechild of simon schama and beyonce .

this mixtape he released this weekend should help to take the gloss off a little as its all bible influenced gangster talk which only sounds weirder when paired with the already rather dated beats that accompany it .
curtis harding - surf there appears to be something of a 60s southern soul singing revival going on ( see also : leon bridges ) and it all sounds pretty decent to me .
this track is given extra garage rock sprinkles too which ai n't that bad a thing , unless you suddenly think of the never mind the buzzcocks theme tune .
which i did .
and it ruined the experience .
there 's three hours of chris morris radio on the bbc this weekend , here'a little trailer for it : are the planes sniffing the building ?

documents.title: five things we learned from ten seconds of jurassic world footage
text: in an entirely worthwhile piece of promotional activity there has been a video released showing you what to expect from a trailer that will be released later this week for a film that will be released next year .
here are the key findings from this video .
the gate to jurassic world has lights on it .
the dinosaurs run too fast to grab a pic that is n't blurry .
mr garrison 's it bike is real .
the screens in jurassic world hq are blue and there 's a woman looking over her shoulder .
star lord has a new waistcoast .
gwen stefani has some new music , it 's produced by pharrell .
it 's got a cool bounce to it and some of the silly tone of say harajuku girls .
it also has a lyric about having new glasses .
but it 's not really as good as this , is it .
but it 's difficult to repeat the success of things you did a decade ago .
i mean , i tried eating a box of ritz crackers without taking a sip of water at the weekend .
did n't get anywhere near the end .
